name: KommandCore
tag_list: business, management, project-management, collaboration, web-apps, software, communication, saas, interface, smart
overview:
LLC KommandCore is a service-company providing users with a wide set of web tools intended to form and manage business relations and servicing such relationships.

LLC KommandCore is the sole author and developer of the KommandCore web application.

The company ideology is founded on the principle of “lively management of projects”.

We are always open for the world and ready for any types of communication and cooperation with you.

milestones.description: The project of the KommandCore web service is initiated. The authors of this idea decided to organize an enterprise and opened the KommandCore LLC. This company was intended to provide the users with complex service in effective interaction (collaboration

The web service development ideology is completed. The release about the start of product development. The DEMO-version of the web-serviceâ€™s promo website was launched. The first experimental demonstration of the potential functions and opportunities of
The positioning of KommandCore LLC in Russia was started up. The first All-Russian meeting of IT-startapers and investors was held in Kazan.
milestones.source_description: First meeting of IT startupers and VCs in Kazan

milestones.description: The completion of works on the intuitive design of the web service.
milestones.source_description: The description and the essence of  design

milestones.description: The marketing conception of the KommandCore service was elaborated in detail. Designing and development of the â€œclient vanguardâ€ for the KommandCore web service: completely modernized website of the product was launched.
First 10 customers who started using the KommandCore web service: the paid registration for the clients was opened.
milestones.source_description: Innovative PM Tool â€“ KommandCore: Lively Management of Your Projects

milestones.source_description: KommandCore Combines Project Management With GTD
